entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
